reviewText:
I have viewed many massage videos over the years and I found this one to be disappointing.  The overall content or material provided was good.  Unfortunately, the directions/angles that the video was taken from were poorly chosen.  I found it rather difficult to see exactly what was being demonstrated which is one of the reasons someone purchases a video DVD instead of a book or CD.

Hopefully if another edition is produced this problem will be corrected.
Information is more about kinesiology, trigger point charts are very busy and hard to see.  LMT was very often blocking the view.
